name: Dan Pope (@danielthepope@mastodon.me.uk)
summary: Lovely to catch up with friends at #DDDEastMidlands. I’ve been inspired to write more thanks to @www.jvt.me@www.jvt.me; I learned some new things about microservices; and @computerist@mastodon.social’s talk about robots twisted my arm into buying a Raspberry Pi Pico!
